message: Hi. I have some localization issues with my  student ID. It's in local language and Cyrillic. I sent a mail regarding this on student[at]djangocon but so far, no answer. Can you please tell me who should i contact, where should i write so I can prove the validity of the ID? I want to buy tickets asap.. Best before Apr. 1st. Thanks.
IMHO they should just trust you and just check your ID when you get there? If you don't /look/ like a student they get to put lighted matches under your fingernails.
